updated_cases.title: Validate Egress IP policy based Destination IP/subnet
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create  Egress IP policy matching netwrok location profile as destination IP 
- Review egress_ip_policy.json schema
- Route traffic from ns-client or on proxy ; matching above conditions
 [curl -k -H'host: ifconfig.me' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy being picked indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()
updated_cases.custom_expected:
"dest_network": {
    "negate": true,
    "net_location_objs": [
        "2",
        "6"
    ],
    "domains": [
        "*.google.com",
        "abc.xyz.com"
    ]
}
- Verify  Egress IP policy is matched for one of  destination IP conditions cnfigured.
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy being picked indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()
- Review SkopeIT event/alert shows correct Dest Network infomation.

updated_cases.title: Validate Egress IP policy based Destination IP/subnet; Negate
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; Negating netwrok location profile as Dest IP 
- Review egress_ip_policy.json schema
- Route traffic from ns-client or on proxy 
 [curl -k -H'host: www.box.com' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is not picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is being picked but egressIP so_mark is not applied.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify  Egress IP policy is Negated for one of  destination IP conditions configured and egressIP not being applied.
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark  is NOT picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy being NOT picked indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()
- Review SkopeIT event/alert shows correct Dest Network infomation.

updated_cases.title: Validate Egress IP policies with supported atribute combination together
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; with combination of supported attributes
- Review egress_ip_policy.json schema
- Route traffics from ns-client or on proxy with one or more matching attributes
 [curl -k -H'host: www.box.com' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is being picked and egressIP so_mark is applied.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify  Egress IP policy is matched for one of the conditions configured
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy being picked indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()

updated_cases.title: Validate EMPTY Egress IP policy with DEI Existing FF enabled; All Traffic route  through dedicated egress IP unconditionally
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Clear out all attributes and save empty Egress IP policy. 
- Review json schema doesn't throw any erros in logs
- Validate all traffic  applied so_mark value and no regression on existing behaviour.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify empty policy saved correctly
- Review json have mandatory fields configured as follow: 
{
    "egress_ip_policies": [],
    "json_version": 1
}
- Webui shows DEI as 'Enabled - All Traffic'
- For all traffic workflows EgressIP is applied.

updated_cases.title: Validate if NO EgressIP policy set and DEI existing FF disabled; all traffic route through default proxy public ip
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Clear out all attributes and save empty Egress IP policy. 
- Disable DEI fetaure flag [if enabled]
- Validate all traffic routed through proxy default public IP and NO Dedicated egress IP applied
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify when DEI existing FF is disabled, the Traffic Egress IP is marked as VPOP [if FF enabled] or Default proxy public IP. 
- Verify No critical errors in logs
- Verify site loads correctly and upload/download activity works as expcted.

updated_cases.title: Validate if DEI is marked disabled from webui settings, all traffic route through default proxy public ip
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Update DEIP in webui Settings to "Disable"
- Review tenant_admin_feature_config.json update
- Review Egress_ip_v2.json [ persist configured values but not called ]
- Validate all traffic routed through proxy default public IP and NO Dedicated egress IP applied
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify  tenant_admin_feature_config.json shows FF marked as False
"egress-ip-footprint": {
        "enabled": false
    }
- Review Egress_ip_v2.json
- Verify when DEI existing FF is disabled, the Traffic Egress IP is marked as VPOP [if FF enabled] or Default proxy public IP. 
- Verify No critical errors in logs
- Verify site loads correctly and upload/download activity works as expcted.

updated_cases.title: Validate egress IP policy is configured and disabled new Feature flag after that.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; with combination of supported attributes
- Run Provisioner API to disable new Feature flag 
- Validate all traffic routed through proxy default public IP (if DEIP is disabled)/ VPOP (if enabled)
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- verify egress_ip_v2.json with supported attributes configured.
- Verify API to disable feature flag API works as expcted
- Egress_ip_v2.json may have policy configured, however as FF being disabled, 
- Policy 2 logs will not have evalating egress ip policy.
- This Test case is to validate NO Webui or Proxy Crash in this scenario.

updated_cases.title: Validate Egress ip policy is NOT Matched ; when traffic flow doesn't match either of conditions specified.
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; with combination of supported attributes
- Review egress_ip_policy.json schema
- Route traffics from ns-client or on proxy does NOT matching ANY attributes
 [curl -k -H'host: www.box.com' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is not picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is NOT Matched
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- verify that not all traffic flows has DEI applied when egress ip policy not hit
- Verify if none of the attribute match for traffic flow then Egress IP shows as VPOP (If enabled) or Default Proxy IP
- Verify No critical errors in logs
- Verify site loads correctly and upload/download activity works as expcted.

updated_cases.title: Validate EgressIP policy with RTP configured
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; with combination of supported attributes
- Create Cloudapp aacess RTP policy , applicable for same traffic 
- Route traffics from ns-client or on proxy with one or more matching attributes
 [curl -k -H'host: www.box.com' -H'x-ns-tenant-id: 6274' -H'x-forwarded-for:23.34.5.2' -H'X-Authenticated-User: user-mv-14@prodrestcall.locaL' http://172.16.178.20:8081/ip http://172.16.178.20:8081]
- Review that RTP being applied and necessary Alerts and actions prompted to end user
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark is picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy is being picked and egressIP so_mark is applied.
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify traffic to box.com ; match RTP policy and generate SkopeiT alert and actions prompted to end user
- Review appmodule 3 logs to see so_mark picked 
- Review policy 1 logs, to see EgressIP policy being picked indicated by ns_policy_apply_egress_ip_policy()
-  appmodule 3 log would show:  "setupEgressIp for tenant : 6274 egressIpEnabled : 1 vpopEnabled : 0 EgressIpPolicyDei : 0"

updated_cases.title: Validate Bypass traffic with NSClient Access method; Traffic get byapss at NSGW - Traffic doesn't hit Proxy
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Steering Exception - Bypass traffic - Client ACM
updated_cases.custom_steps:
- Create Egress IP policy; with combination of supported attributes
- Create steering exception for one of the domain configured in egerss Ip policy
- Traffic get byapss at NSGW - Traffic doesn't hit Proxy - Hence NO Egress IP being applied.
- Route the traffic through NS-Client for a domain configured
updated_cases.custom_expected:
- Verify there is no Regression noted.
- Traffic get byapss at NSGW - Traffic doesn't hit Proxy - Hence NO Egress IP being applied.
